recruit.no_athlete: Plus aucun athlète n'est disponible au recrutement. Veuillez revenir au trimestre prochain.

cheese_rolling.name: Cheese Rolling
cheese_rolling.description: The event where brave souls chase a wheel of cheese down a hill, risking bumps, bruises, and a serious craving for cheddar.

buoy_racing.name: Buoy Racing
buoy_racing.description: Because running on water is just too mainstream. Competitors dash around floating buoys in a frantic aquatic race to victory.

treadmill_choregraphy.name: Treadmill Choreography
treadmill_choregraphy.description: The art of dancing on a moving treadmill. It's almost like synchronized swimming, but with less splashing and more groove.

iron_toe.name: Toe Wrestling
iron_toe.description: Like arm wrestling but for your toes. Contestants showcase their precision in intense toe-to-toe duels, proving that finesse trumps brute strength.

donuts_throwing.name: Donuts Throwing
donuts_throwing.description: The sport where accuracy meets deliciousness. Aim your sugary torpedoes through hoops and watch the sprinkles fly!

chess_boxing.name: Chess Boxing
chess_boxing.description: The ultimate test of brains and brawn. Strategize like Kasparov, punch like Tyson, and remember to breathe between rounds.

hopscotch.name: Hopscotch
hopscotch.description: Where grown-ups remember the joy of childhood. Skip through numbered squares and try not to lose your balance—or your dignity.

acrobatic_cup_and_ball.name: Acrobatic Cup-and-Ball
acrobatic_cup_and_ball.description: Juggle, flip, and balance while keeping a ball on a cup. It's like Cirque du Soleil meets street carnival—minus the clowns.

zipline_bow.name: Zipline Bow
zipline_bow.description: Where archery meets adrenaline. Hit targets while zooming down a zipline. It's Robin Hood meets Tarzan, with a splash of bullseye.

jelly_wall_climbing.name: Jelly Wall Climbing
jelly_wall_climbing.description: Climb walls covered in wobbly jelly that makes every ascent as slippery as it is perilous. It's like scaling a giant dessert, but beware not to devour it too soon!

aqua_jogging.name: Aqua Jogging
aqua_jogging.description: When you want to run but swimming is your jam. Glide through the water like a ninja, leaving splashes of fitness in your wake.

mermaid_swimming.name: Mermaid Swimming
mermaid_swimming.description: Where legs transform into fins and dreams come true. Channel your inner Ariel with graceful dives and underwater twirls.

musical_fencing.name: Musical Fencing
musical_fencing.description: Dueling to a beat. En garde to the rhythm and parry with panache. Bonus points for choreographed swordplay and jazz hands.

umbrella_fight.name: Umbrella Fight
umbrella_fight.description: Rain or shine, it's time to battle! Grab your brolly, unleash your inner Mary Poppins, and dance-fight your way to victory.

tree_throwing.name: Tree Throwing
tree_throwing.description: Because tossing logs is how giants stay fit. Hurl trees for distance and accuracy, proving that strong arms and green thumbs go hand in hand.

jump_boxing.name: Jump Boxing
jump_boxing.description: Where pugilism meets plyometrics. Punch your way to fitness with explosive jumps and quick combos. Float like a butterfly, sting like a kangaroo.

slackline_gym.name: Slackline Gym
slackline_gym.description: Balance, bounce, and boggle minds. Walk, flip, and pose on a wobbly line—because life's more fun when you're one misstep away from flying.

acrobatic_bow.name: Acrobatic Bow
acrobatic_bow.description: Archery on the edge. Perform flips, spins, and mid-air shots while aiming for bullseyes. Cupid meets Cirque du Soleil with a quiver full of style.

arc_escalation.name: Arc-Escalation
arc_escalation.description: A daring mix of archery and climbing. Scale walls and obstacles while aiming at targets with precision. It's like being a Spider-Man archer on a mission.

parkour.name: Parkour
parkour.description: The art of making your morning commute an extreme sport. Leap, roll, and vault over urban obstacles like a ninja on caffeine.

100m.name: 100 meters Sprint
100m.description: A blink-and-you'll-miss-it race where athletes blast down the track faster than you can say 'Where's the fire?'

swim_100m.name: 100 meters Swim
swim_100m.description: A splashy dash across the pool where speed demons race to the finish like they're escaping a school of hungry sharks.

dance.name: Dance
dance.description: Where you groove, shimmy, and shake to the beat, proving that even if you have two left feet, you can still look fabulous.

fencing.name: Fencing
fencing.description: A swashbuckling duel where you try to poke your opponent with a sword, all while looking like a fancy Zorro with a shiny mask.

javelin_throwing.name: Javelin Throwing
javelin_throwing.description: Where athletes channel their inner spear-wielding warrior and see how far they can chuck a pointy stick without skewering the opposing crew.

boxing.name: Boxing
boxing.description: Where two people punch each other while dancing around the ring, aiming for a knockout and hoping their face doesn't look like a Picasso painting afterward.

high_jump.name: High Jump
high_jump.description: The sport of leaping over a bar set increasingly higher, like playing limbo in reverse but with more flailing and less music.

gymnastics.name: Gymnastics
gymnastics.description: Where athletes twist, flip, and contort their bodies in ways that defy gravity and make us mere mortals gasp in awe (and sympathy pain).

archery.name: Archery
archery.description: The skill of shooting arrows at targets, making you feel like a modern-day Robin Hood or Katniss Everdeen, minus the medieval attire or dystopian drama.

escalation.name: Escalation
escalation.description: The thrill of climbing up challenging routes or obstacle courses, battling gravity and channeling your inner Spider-Man.

fire_athlete.title: Licenciement
fire_athlete.text:
Vous vous apprêtez à licencier un athlète. Il quittera donc votre équipe et vous ne pourrez plus l'entraîner, mais les médailles qu'il vous a rapportées seront conservées dans l'historique.

Souhaitez-vous vraiment poursuivre ? Cette action ne pourra pas être par la suite annulée.

choose_language.title: Choix de la langue
choose_language.text: Veuillez choisir la langue dans laquelle vous souhaitez jouer. Vous pourrez changer plus tard au cours de la partie.

choose_difficulty.title: Choix de la difficulté
choose_difficulty.text: Veuillez choisir la difficulté dans laquelle vous souhaitez jouer cette partie. Vous ne pourrez plus changer la difficulté pour cette partie, mais vous pourrez par la suite en recommencer d'autres avec des difficultés différentes.

delete_game_confirmation_1.title: Suppression des données de la partie
delete_game_confirmation_1.text: Vous vous apprêtez à supprimer les données de cette partie. Voulez-vous poursuivre ?

delete_game_confirmation_2.title: Suppression des données de la partie
delete_game_confirmation_2.text: Les données de cette partie seront définitivement supprimées et cette action ne pourra pas être annulée. Êtes-vous vraiment sûr de vouloir le faire ?

recruit_athlete.title: Recrutement d'un athlète
recruit_athlete.text: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir recruter cet athlète ? Les coûts de recrutement ne seront pas remboursés si vous changez d'avis.

validate_planning.title: Validation de l'emploi du temps
validate_planning.text: Êtes-vous satisfait de l'emploi du temps que vous avez créé pour ce trimestre ? Il ne pourra plus être modifié cette étape de validation passée.
